details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate to reach Master Level
The stats are affected by %Stat bonuses

[Note]: Link Skill has a togglable effect where stats provided from your equipment can be swapped between STR + %STR and DEX + %DEX
  • Double-click the Link Skill to turn this effect ON/OFF
  • The effect only applies to the original Link Skill, not the transferred version
  • Excludes Primary and Secondary Weapon, Totems, and Symbols

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Pirate' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Pirate and talk to Kyrin to accept a quest called 'The 2 Types of Pirate'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Gunslinger and you will be on the path to a Corsair. Gunslinger is the 2nd job of Corsair

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Rapid Fire - Reinforce and Boss Rush
  • Brain Scrambler - Reinforce, Extra Strike, and Boss Rush

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
Tertiary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first and so on
  • 6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Huynni, Styxa, and the members of the Corsair Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Master of Swimming
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

primary.name: Master of Organization
primary.shortDesc: Permanently expands Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc. Inventory.

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Sommersault Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 155%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Kick forward damaging enemies
details: Only usable when equipped with Knuckles

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Bullet Cost: 2, fire 2 shots dealing 260% damage. At point of impact, Explosion Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Max Range: 380
primary.desc: Fires two bullets that explode on impact damaging nearby enemies
details: Only usable when equipped with a Gun

primary.name: Pirate Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Dash
primary.shortDesc: Dash, MP Cost: 1, Duration: Up to 10 sec., Movement Speed: +50, Jump: +20, Knockback Resistance: +100%
primary.desc: Double-tap the Left or Right Arrow Keys to start sprinting to increase Movement Speed and Jump
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
While sprinting, gain 100% Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Shadow Heart
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Bullet Time
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +22, Jump: +10, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Rapid Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20 and 3 bullets, Damage: 205%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Rapidly fires several shots at multiple enemies

primary.name: Swift Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Bullet Cost: 3, Damage: 201%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Fires three shots consecutively at a single enemy

primary.name: Scurvy Summons
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Duration: 120 sec. Summoned Nautilus crewman, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 3, Bullets Fired: 2, Cooldown: 45 sec.
primary.desc: Summons a crewmate to fight alongside you
details: Prioritizes enemy with the highest max HP within range first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Recoil Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 210%
primary.desc: Fires a shot that pushes you backward

primary.name: Wings
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10
primary.desc: Launches you up into the air
details: Holding the Skill Key will allow you to glide after using the skill
Can be used in the air

primary.name: Infinity Blast
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10, Can cast attack skills without consuming bullets.
details: Uses the bullet with the highest Attack to calculate your damage
Not usable if there are no bullets in your inventory

primary.name: Agile Guns
primary.shortDesc: Gun Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20

primary.name: Gun Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Gun Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +10%, Ammo: +200
details: Additionally increases the max number of charges each Ammo slot can hold

primary.name: Physical Trianing
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Strength by 30 and DEX by +30\nPermanently decreases Damage Taken by 20%

primary.name: Blunderbuster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32 and 2 bullets, Damage: 480%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Fires a blast of bullets forward

primary.name: Blackboot Bill
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Bullets Consumed: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 734%, Knockback Range: 400
primary.desc: Fires a giant bullet that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Siege Bomber
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Cannon Damage: 300%, Summon Duration: 60 sec
primary.desc: Summons a stationary cannon that attacks nearby enemies
details: Prioritizes enemy with the highest max HP within range first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff based on the number rolled
details: [One]: Reduces cooldown of by 50%
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Cross Cut Blast
primary.shortDesc: Attack +60

primary.name: Outlaw's Code
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +20%, Max HP/MP: +600, Status and Elemental Resistances: +15%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Fullmetal Jacket
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: 20%, Critical Rate: +30%, Ignore Defense: 20%

primary.name: All Aboard
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Summons two brave crew members to assist you in battle.
Sharpshooter Crew: Bomb Damage: 170%, Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 4
Dual Pistol Crew: Bullet Damage: +200% points
If you're targeted by a fatal status effect, a crew member will block it. That crew member cannot block another status effect until re-summoned.
Summon Duration: 120 sec, Cooldown: 45 sec.
primary.desc: Increases the %Damage of by a flat amount and allows you to summon two crew members at once
details: Crew members can also block an Abnormal Status per each summon
Additionally, adds a new crew member who throws bombs

primary.name: Rapid Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 9, Damage: 417% per shot, Speed: locked at 120 while active
primary.desc: While held, fire a continuous stream of bullets forward
details: You can move and jump while casting
Not affected by Attack Speed

primary.name: Brain Scrambler
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 984%, Number of Attacks: 13, Enemy DEF Ignored: 60%, Bonus Critical Chance: 100%\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Fires a powerful shot at a single enemy
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

primary.name: Eight-Legs Easton
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Bullets Consumed: 4, Damage: 649%, Max Enemies Attacked: 8, Number of Attacks: 4.\n[Passive Effect : Battleship Nautilus's skill damage +130% points.]
primary.desc: Fires a barrage of bullets forward
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage of by a flat amount
If used while pressing the Down Arrow Key, the attack range will be reduced, but you will be immune to knockbacks (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Quickdraw
primary.shortDesc: Your attacks have a 8% chance to activate Quickdraw. Upon triggering, grants your next Brain Scrambler, Ugly Bomb, Nautilus Strike, or Target Lock an additional 25% Final Damage
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to grant increased %Final Damage for the next use of the following skills:

primary.name: Broadside
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Summons a ship for 60 sec that fires its cannons at regular intervals. Cannonballs explode upon contact with the enemy. Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3. Up to 2 can be summoned simultaneously. When Firing Orders is active, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3, Explosion Damage: 400%, Cooldown: 0.5 sec.
primary.desc: Summons a battleship that fires bombs at nearby enemies
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with
Broadside will fire focused shots on a targeted location marked by
Up to 2 battleships can be summoned at a time
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Firing Orders
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 60 sec\nOne set of Firing Orders can be active at any time.\nBroadside automatically bombards nearby enemies, and the bombardment prioritizes enemies affected by Parrotargetting. If there are no Parrotargetting enemies, it first attacks the boss monster.
primary.desc: Marks your location causing to fire focused shots at the targeted location
details: Shares Skill Points (SP) with
Prioritizes enemies marked with then bosses
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF causing to mark the location of the targeted enemy

primary.name: Parrotargetting
primary.shortDesc: MP 37 consumed, 610% damage, final damage increased by 25% when attacking targeted monster\n[Passive Effect: Critical Damage +20%]
primary.desc: Fires a shot that debuffs an enemy and causes all attacks to target this enemy
details: [Debuff]: Attacks against this enemy deal increased %Final Damage
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage
Prioritizes bosses within range

primary.name: Nautilus Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 440%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 30 sec\n[Passive Effect: Majestic Presence Final Damage +30%]
primary.desc: Launches a massive attack that damages a large area
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage of
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Jolly Roger
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Duration: 180 sec, Attack Power: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Avoidability: -300\n[Passive Effects - Knockback Resistance: +60%]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Aggressive Stance
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 10 sec., Damage: +15%. Landing attacks while the buff is active will refresh the duration.\n[Passive Effect: Damage Taken -15%]
primary.desc: Successfully landing attacks grant a %Damage buff
details: Also permanently increases %Damage Reduction

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

primary.name: Ahoy Mateys
primary.shortDesc: Final Crewman Damage: +15%, When a crewman is summoned: Attack Power +45, Critical Damage +5%, Critical Rate +10%, Speed +30, Incoming Damage -15%.\n[Passive Effect: Max HP +5000, Critical Damage +25%]
primary.desc: Increases the %Final Damage of and grants a buff while crewmates are summoned
details: [Buff]: Grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage, %Crit Rate, Speed, and %Damage Reduction
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage and grants flat Max HP

primary.name: Majestic Presence
primary.shortDesc: Gun Mastery: +70%, Final Damage: +8%, Attack Power: +30\n[Final Attack Skills] 275% additional explosion damage upon performing a shot-firing attack.
primary.desc: Successfully landing shot-firing attacks deal an additional attack
details: Additionally increases %Gun Mastery, %Final Damage, and grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Saving Grace
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When Double Down does not activate, there is a 40% chance for the cooldown to not apply. The next cast after this will activate Double Down with 4 or above.

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Addition
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Lucky number 7 added to Double Down
details: When rolled, increases %Ignore DEF

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases the chances of rolling a 4, 5, or 6 in Roll of the Dice.

hyperActive.name: Whaler's Potion
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, HP Recovered: 99% of max HP, Damage Taken: -15% for 20 sec\nSummon Final Damage: +50%\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: Upon use, recovers max HP and grants a %Damage Reduction buff
details: While active, increases the %Final Damage of summons
Unaffected by cooldown resets

hyperActive.name: Ugly Bomb
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 15 \nCooldown: 15 sec
hyperActive.desc: Drops a massive bomb in front of you

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Bullet Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 4 sec. Periodically deal 1435% damage 7 times on up to 15 enemies.\nCan move and jump while using the skill. This skill will be immediately canceled if you use it again.\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Wildy fires bullets in all directions
details: While casting, you can move and use
While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the attack early

fifthMain.name: Target Lock
fifthMain.shortDesc:
[Passive Effect] Focuses aim on up to 12 enemies within range whenever skill is not in cooldown.
[Active Effect] MP Cost: 850, Targeted enemies take 1022% damage 15 times, at +100% Critical Rate.
Deals extra damage for Target Locks. Bonus stacks up to 3x.
Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Fires devastating shots at marked targets
details: While Target Lock is not on cooldown, targets in range are randomly marked for the attack while prioritizing bosses with the highest Max HP first
The target will blink 3 times before selecting a new target<bp_If you activate Target Lock while on the last blink, it will deal extra damage_>
You are invincible while casting<bp_Depending on the number of blinks, the invincibility time will increase_>
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Nautilus Assault
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Invincible while casting
Ship Attack: The ship attacks at set intervals. Damage: 1980%, Number of Attacks: 6, Ship Attack Activation Count: 7
Volley: Fires a volley at set intervals. Damage: 990%, Number of Attacks: 12, Volley Activation Count: 36
Cooldown: 180 sec
When either Nautilus Strike or Nautilus Assault is used, a cooldown of 8 sec is applied, but it won't be applied if another cooldown longer than that time is already applied.
fifthMain.desc: Summons the Nautilus to launch an assault
details: The ship and assault both deal damage
If either or are used, there is a short cooldown (8 secs) before either can activated unless they are already on cooldown
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Death Trigger
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750. Fires up to 7 shots, which attack up to 7 enemies with 780% damage 7 time(s).\nCooldown: 45 sec. Cooldown decreases by 0.5 sec. for each remaining ricochet.
fifthMain.desc: Fires several bullets that ricochets to multiple enemies
details: If there is an enemy affected by the debuff, all bullets will target that enemy
Cooldown decreases depending on the number of remaining ricochets
Can be used in the air
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rapid Fire
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost per attack: 19, Damage: 610% per shot. When 5 attacks land, reloads 1 clip. When 10 clips reload, changes to shootout mode. Speed locked at 120 while active.
[Passive Effect - Majestic Presence Damage: +145% points]
------Shootout Mode HEXA Rapid Fire------
MP Cost per attack: 19, consumes 1 clip every 0.6 sec
Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 297%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 4
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Broadside
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 155, Summons a ship for 60 sec that fires its cannons at regular intervals
Cannonballs explode upon contact with the enemy. Damage: 840%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
Up to 2 can be summoned simultaneously
When Firing Orders is active, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3, Explosion Damage: 840%
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: The Dreadnought
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 2000, invincible during casting
Advance bravely, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1270%, Number of Attacks: 12, Wind and Waves: 52
After the attack ends, the naval vessel stays in the air for 15 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 7, Bombardment Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 8
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Corsair is a DEX pirate class part of the Explorers. Corsair utilize Guns as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Corsair can equip Far Sights
